PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2024/00392--- Address: Elm Grove Estate216 - 220 High StreetSuttonSM1 1NU--- Proposal: Outline planning application (with all matters reserved) for development including demolition of existing buildings and structures within Elm Grove Estate and erection of new buildings to provide residential floorspace (Class C3); retention, refurbishment and rear extension of 216-220 High Street to provide town centre (Class E), community (Class F2), sui generis and residential floorspace (Class C3); new pedestrian and vehicular access; associated amenity space, open space, public realm and landscaping; car and cycle parking spaces; plant; refuse storage; servicing; other works incidental to the proposed (phased) development; and Phase 0 enabling preliminary works in the form of demolition of two existing bungalows on-site.--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 21-MAR-25---

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2025/00399--- Address: Elm Grove Estate216 - 220 High StreetSuttonSM1 1NU--- Proposal: Non material amendment to approved application DM2024/00392 which allowed the 'Outline planning application (with all matters reserved) for development including demolition of existing buildings and structures within Elm Grove Estate and erection of new buildings to provide residential floorspace (Class C3); retention, refurbishment and rear extension of 216-220 High Street to provide town centre (Class E), community (Class F2), sui generis and residential floorspace (Class C3); new pedestrian and vehicular access; associated amenity space, open space, public realm and landscaping; car and cycle parking spaces; plant; refuse storage; servicing; other works incidental to the proposed (phased) development; and Phase 0 enabling preliminary works in the form of demolition of two existing bungalows on-site' to provide extension of Phase 0 to include the demolition of 4 terraced houses.--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 28-MAR-25---

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2025/00754--- Address: Northern Gateway Site 246 - 254 High Street + 2 - 8 Marshall's RoadSuttonSM1 1PA--- Proposal: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a part one, part four storey building comprising Use Class F1 (Learning and non-residential institutions) including the installation of air source heat pumps and rooflights to the main flat roof, with outdoor amenity space to ground floor flat roof, vehicular and pedestrian access from Elm Grove, parking spaces, cycle spaces and store, refuse store, provision of new boundary treatments including vehicular and pedestrian access gates and fences and associated hard and soft landscaping.--- Status: INV--- Decision: --- Date Decision Issued: ---

description: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a part one, part four storey building comprising Use Class F1 (Learning and non-residential institutions) including the installation of air source heat pumps and rooflights to the roof, with outdoor amenity space to ground floor flat roof, vehicular and pedestrian access from Elm Grove, parking spaces, cycle spaces and store, refuse store, provision of new boundary treatments including vehicular and pedestrian access gates and fences and associated hard and soft landscaping.
